review: The Amazon Fire TV works as advertised. It would be nice if it could accommodate more of the Kindle apps; I have several on my Kindle Fire that would be nice to show on the TV. And I do see where the Amazon apps are not always as fully functional as the same app on an IPad (example is Campus Insiders where I could watch something live on the IPad, but not on the Kindel). While it is possible to find multiple movies or TV shows on the Amazon website, the Fire TV itself does not have much of a browse feature. Once the movies or TV shows are in the Watchlist, they can more easily be accessed. And of course, the search function will bring up some, but not as well as it should.  I hope over time that there are ongoing improvements. For what it does have, it works very well, and was extremely easy to set up.
